Name: Burn Me Alive
About the game: The first collaboration of two indie developers, Burn Me Alive takes players on a dark journey that starts with the personal tragedy of the protagonist in a 1977 Tennessee and evolves into an investigation of its own story. The atmosphere is grimy and dark with a twist of strange, nightmarish sensations and occult symbolism. GAMEPLAY: Put clues together and uncover mysteries Shoot or sneak past adversaries, use the environment to stall them if they chase you Gain abilities as you progress WARNING: This videogame can cause seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.
